EmailTemplate.name: 202004_BK_Webinar_SocialFlight_AeroVue_Touch_and_Integrated_Panel_MC.30 Day Foll
EmailTemplate.subject: AeroVue Touch and Integrated Panel
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Need more information?
Thank you for your interest in viewing our recent on-demand webinar “AeroVue Touch and Integrated Panel” from April 30, 2020.
In case you wanted to watch this on-demand, here’s the link and access code: Link: Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AeroVue_Touch_and_Integrated_PanelBK_LP_Webinar_SocialFlight_AeroVue_Touch_and_Integrated_Panel_MC.html]]> Access code: 748302
If you need links again regarding the equipment mentioned in the webinar:
- AeroVue Touch <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerovue-touch]]>: Award-winning touchscreen PFD/MFD flight display - AeroNav GPS Navigators <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeronav-gps-navigation]]>: Slide-in touchscreen replacement for legacy GNS 430, 530 - AeroCruze 100 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-100]]>: Affordable autopilot offered in three convenient form factors - AeroCruze 230 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-230]]>: Touchscreen autopilot packed with features - AeroFlight <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeroflight]]>: Compact digital attitude indicator - AeroPoint 200 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeropoint-200]]>: TSO’d as primary instrument for single engine aircraft - AeroPoint 300 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeropoint-300]]>: Designed for twin-engine aircraft, with pre-wired harness - Confidence Plan <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/productitems/bendixking-confidence-plan]]>: Insurance plan for your new avionics - Total Avionics Plan (TAP) <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/pages/total-avionics-plan]]>: Unique alternative in financing your new panel as a subscription - Find a dealer <[[https://bkx.bendixking.com/Dealer-Directory/]]> in your area - Schedule a demo <[[mailto:sales@bendixking.com?subject=Talk%20to%20me%20about%20ADS-B%20equipment]]> of our available products for your aircraft with our sales team
For other BendixKing products, check out our video <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xPBRd-8jn04]]> walk-through of our Cessna 182, which has the full AeroVue Touch flight deck <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/~/media/bendixking/files/3122-bk-aerovue-ifd-owner-version.pdf]]>! View the video <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xPBRd-8jn04]]> walk-through, or contact <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/contact-us]]> us with any questions.
